text: The Ministry of Villages, Development of Disadvantaged Regions, and Transmigration (, abbreviated as Kemendesa) is a government ministry in charge for assisting the President in regards to developing the rural and disadvantages areas in Indonesia. Through its community development, is would help to speed up the development of villages. It also the responsibility to in the Transmigration Program. == History == == Events == 19 October 2015 - Minister Marwan Jafar launched the Developing Villages Index(IDM) 6 November 2018 - Minister Eko Putro Sandjojo announced that the 2019 village funds would be "prioritized for use in community empowerment activities, village economy, and village innovation". == Ministers == {| class="wikitable" |+ ! !Took Office !Left Office !Minister !Ministry |- |1st |27 October 2014 |27 July 2016 |Marwan Ja'far |Ministry of Villages, Development of Disadvantaged Regions, and Transmigration |- |2nd |27 July 2016 |Current |Eko Putro Sandjojo |Ministry of Villages, Development of Disadvantaged Regions, and Transmigration |} == References == == External links == Category:Government ministries of Indonesia
title: Ministry of Villages, Development of Disadvantaged Regions, and Transmigration
